paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from breast cancer patients in Saudi Arabia.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We identified a total of fourteen point mutations and one deletion related to BRCA1, BRCA2, and RAD50 genes from our BRCA panel analysis of breast cancer samples.
We identified a total of fourteen point mutations and one deletion related to BRCA1, BRCA2, and RAD50 genes from our BRCA panel analysis of breast cancer samples.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is likely to lead to an aberrant transcript with a premature stop codon.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was reported for the first time in breast cancer patients from Saudi Arabia.
key_quotes: The mutations of TP53 (p.R81X), VHL (p.E52X), and BRCA2 (p.K3326X), which lead to an aberrant transcript with a premature stop codon, were reported for the first time in Saudi breast cancer patients.
